Name: Cold Way
About the game: “Cold Way” is a pixel-art platformer about a boy whose home was destroyed by evil yeti. And he has to travel through this cold, arctic world full of dangers to find and destroy him. He will have to go through a difficult path and be very careful not to die. He needs to kill enemies to collect coins from them and improve his skills. Pass large, interesting levels Explore the world Enjoy a beautiful winter Level up the character Discover new skills Collect coins Fight with a variety of enemies Don't die About features of this game 42 big levels Relaxing and cozy gameplay Relaxing audio
